thnx for the upload BONE but the emulator lags a lot. I am using a DUAL core 1.4GHz HTC sensation with 768MB RAM with the latest Android software updates (which is a high end smartphone) and testing Pokemon HeartGold. It plays at around 3~5 fps. It loads pretty fast but the game itself lags. 
3/10

1: No root is needed.
2: this is the real deal.
3: no use of getting it since it only supports dualcore and with my quadcore tegra 3 htc one x phone, it still lags just as much as it did on my old tegra 2 dualcore Optimus 2x.
